Engineer Hours: The hours actually worked, internal is doing more.
The internal team is a. taking on less work, and projecting to work less hours than the external counterparts, but actually working more

But on the other hand, the external teams are doing more work than the internal, projecting to work much more than the internal people, but working less than the internal people. This could be because they are more efficient.

Scope Code: how many more could we internalize

If we take X amout of externalized work and internalize it, we will save X * 5k. We have on average overpredicted 65 hours of work for internal projects, and overpredicted 124 hours for external projects. That is 3 more projects internal. 3 less projects external.
